entry.def: On a steam train, the footplate is the place where the driver and fireman stand.

means.word_mean: 1. the platform in the cab of a locomotive on which the engineer stands to operate the controls

auth_sentence.content: From up on the footplate of his clanking, hissing beast of a Black Five locomotive, he waves us aboard.
